title: Trivago's Hefer Looks at More Normal Summer Travel
itunes:title: Trivago's Hefer Looks at More Normal Summer Travel
description:
Trivago CEO Axel Hefer discusses the online hotel search platform's summer travel data report.
Hosts: Katie Greifeld and Mike Regan. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
